casebody.data:
ARCANUM INVESTIGATIONS, INC., et al., petitioners,
v.
Erik H. GORDON. No. 13-539. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 13, 2014. Case below, Gordon v. Softech Intern., Inc., 726 F.3d 42 . Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.
